history.proof: unfold sum_n_m. srun best use: @iter_nat_point, @plus_zero_r unfold: AbelianGroup.plus, iter_nat, AbelianGroup.sort, plus.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of plus_zero_r (plus _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_zero_r (plus _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n : nat Unable to unify "a n" with "iter plus zero (seq.iota n match n with | 0 => S n | S l => n - l end) a".

original: unfold sum_n_m. unfold iter_nat. simpl. rewrite plus_zero_r. rewrite plus_zero_r. reflexivity.
